word:
You will have a healthy mind if you are temperate in eating and drinking and in labor. Temperance in all things is required. Make a decided move. God requires it of you. Adopt strict temperance in all your habits. Leave 


                                     -299- 

off stimulating, hurtful indulgences."--Letter 20, 1867, pp. 2, 3, 5. (To Brother Morrell, December 28, 1867.)
